channel.title: Cornell Harper Chicago Grandpa on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Cornell Harper Chicago Grandpa on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: linuxKILLa: i feel like a trophy wife
item.description: I really do. It is weird. I mean….Well, tonight my grandfather and cousin come to chicago to hang out. It should be really nice. I am very happy. It will be fun. I am taking tomarrow and monday off. whee.. four day weekend.. yeahaa.. so excited This weekend.. I really don’t know what I will be doing. I want to do something fun. but nobody knows what will happen. I mean I will be hanging out with my grandpa of course.
